sentences.en: "Let's invite her to dinner." — "Over my dead body!"
sentences.cn: “我们请她来吃晚饭吧。”——“除非我死了！”

sentences.en: "Look," she said, getting a brainstorm, "Why don't you invite them here?"
sentences.cn: “对了，”她灵机一动说道，“你干吗不请他们到这儿来？”

sentences.en: Don't expect that niggard to invite you to dinner.
sentences.cn: 别指望那个吝啬鬼会请你吃饭.

sentences.en: He denounced the decision to invite his fellow archbishop to preach.
sentences.cn: 他痛斥了邀请其他大主教同仁布道的决定。

sentences.en: I invite every citizen to carefully study the document.
sentences.cn: 我请每位市民都仔细研读该文件。

sentences.en: Let's invite her to the disco — she needs distraction.
sentences.cn: 我们请她去迪斯科舞会 吧,她需要散散心.

sentences.en: Let's invite them over for a drink.
sentences.cn: 咱们去请他们过来喝一杯.

sentences.en: She had twisted his arm to get him to invite her.
sentences.cn: 她说服他向自己发出邀请。

sentences.en: Successful candidates will be invited for interview next week.
sentences.cn: 通过甄别的候选人将获邀于下周参加面试。

sentences.en: They haven't got an invite to the wedding.
sentences.cn: 他们还没收到参加婚礼的请柬。

sentences.en: To follow the proposed course of action is to invite nemesis.
sentences.cn: 按照别人建议的行动步骤而行动就是自找报应.

sentences.en: You can invite whomever you like.
sentences.cn: 你可以邀请你喜欢的任何人.

trans.tran_en: an invitation to a party, meal etc
to ask someone to come to a party, wedding, meal etc

trans.tran_cn: 邀请， 聘请； 请求， 征求； 招致； 吸引
trans.tran_en: to ask someone to come to a party, wedding, meal etc
